About This Page

The "Friend Management" page contains the Friends:Add function, which is an all-in-one function to manage friendships. Using this same template and providing different segments in the URI, Friends:Add knows when to make friend requests, confirm friendships, delete friends, block friends, and above all, send out the appropriate email notifications.

It makes use of the following functions:

  • Friends:Add to manage friendship requests/confirms, removals, and blocks.
